column5:
Joint Master's Degree in Human-Centered AI
               

              offered by the
              
               University of Milan
              
              , the
              
               University of Milan-Bicocca
              
              and the
              
               University of Pavia
              
              . The
              
               Application
              

               Period
              
              starts from
              
               27 March
              
              till
              
               31 October 2023.
              
              For more information,
              

                click here
               


               .
column7: Tuition fees have two instalments. The first is fixed at €156 (regional tax of €140 + €16 stamp duty) The second instalment varies based on ISEE value: Students on track/off track for one year with ISEE ≤ €22,000: €0.00 - €3,904 Students off track for >1 year with ISEE ≤ €22,000: €200 - €5,856
